school: Biological Sciences School, Chemistry & Molec Biosciences
description: Students undertaking this course will examine the fundamental building blocks of life: cells and genes. We will explore the connections between physical processes at the molecular level and whole organism phenotype and identify how cellular, genetic and evolutionary processes affect everyday life.
restricted: Any student who has completed AGRC1020, AGRC1021, ANIM1060, or AGRC1041 will need permission from the Faculty of Science to enrol into BIOL1020. Please contact the Faculty of Science.
